sendResult(T).Description: Send the result back to the caller.

Parameters: Bundle: A bundle that contains extra data.
sendError(android.os.Bundle).Description: Notify the caller of a failure. This is supported only when it is used in @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#onCustomAction_E@.

detach().Description: Detach this message from the current thread and allow the @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendResult_E@ call to happen later.

Parameters: Bundle: A bundle that contains extra data.
sendProgressUpdate(android.os.Bundle).Description: Send an interim update to the caller. This method is supported only when it is used in @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#onCustomAction_E@.

ClassDesc: Completion handler for asynchronous callback methods in @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat_E@. Each of the methods that takes one of these to send the result must call either @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendResult_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendError_E@ to respond to the caller with the given results or errors. If those functions return without calling @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendResult_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendError_E@, they must instead call @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#detach_E@ before returning, and then may call @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendResult_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendError_E@ when they are done. If @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendResult_E@, @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendError_E@, or @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#detach_E@ is called twice, an exception will be thrown. Those functions might also want to call @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendProgressUpdate_E@ to send interim updates to the caller. If it is called after calling @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendResult_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#media#MediaBrowserServiceCompat#Result#sendError_E@, an exception will be thrown.
